newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: CRICKET- N.TRANSVAAL WINS TOSS, TRANSVAAL TO BAT.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET- N.TRANSVAAL WINS TOSS, TRANSVAAL TO BAT.

text.p: Northern Transvaal captain Mark Davis won the toss and invited Transvaal to bat first on the second day of their four-day Supersport Series cricket match at Centurion Park near Pretoria on Saturday.
Steady rain for the past week and a wet pitch washed out the scheduled first day's play on Friday.

Northern Transvaal - Andre Seymore, Roy Pienaar, Martin van Jaarsveld, Richie Richardson, Dirkie de Vos, Mark Davis (captain), Steve Elworthy, Ivan Pistorius, Rudi Bryson, Fanie de Villiers, Greg Smith.
Transvaal - Adam Bacher, Ken Rutherford (captain), Hussein Mannack, Daryll Cullinan, Neil McKenzie, Nic Pothas, Ross Veenstra, Andrew Hall, Stefan Jacobs, Clive Eksteen, Wayne Kidwell.
